characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist on a yellow scooter
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Initially, a white sedan is seen on the left side of the road. As the vehicle progresses, a blue car appears on the left side, and a cyclist on a yellow scooter is seen on the right side of the road. The cyclist is moving towards the center of the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while navigating through the city road. The vehicle is likely to decelerate due to the presence of the cyclist moving towards the center of the road, which poses a potential collision risk.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward. 2) Left side: A blue car, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 3) Right side: A cyclist on a yellow scooter, approximately 3 meters away, moving towards the center of the road.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with moderate traffic. A white sedan is ahead in the same lane, and a van is on the right side. The road is lined with trees, and the weather appears clear.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is staying in its lane and not making any sudden movements.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A van, approximately 10 meters away, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle.
